articles.description: The France international midfielder, 29, returns to the Turin club on a free transfer after his Old Trafford contract expired, bringing an end to an underwhelming six year second spell there.
articles.content:
Angry Manchester United furiously hit out at Paul Pogba's latest social media post after declaring himself 'back like I have never left' upon re-signing for Juventus.
